## Scientific Output - Eval. Criterion 5.1.1 of the Call

### Publications (n=41)
```{r}
library(readxl); library(knitr); library(dplyr)
path <- "data/cv.xlsx"
df <- read_excel(path, sheet = "Publications")
if ("URL" %in% names(df)) {
	df$URL <- ifelse(!is.na(df$URL) & nzchar(df$URL), paste0("[link](", df$URL, ")"), "")
}
knitr::kable(df, escape = FALSE, longtable = TRUE)
```
